snippet.title: Domestic Dog Simulator: a game of bones (PC gameplay)
snippet.description:
In Domestic Dog Simulator, you are a randomly generated dog that gets to wee all over town!
Subscribe for more: http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=randomiseuser

*Updated version now available on Steam!*

Domestic Dog Simulator is a irreverent game where you hatch a randomly generated dog out of an egg and go round town buying things, digging up bones, playing frisbee and laying big piles of poo. All while trying to stay alive!

This Domestic Dog Simulator gameplay video shows you a typical day in the life of several dogs, including a mad alien dog with several eyes and green urine! We go herding sheep, playing frisbee and bothering the local girl dogs.

Domestic Dog Simulator game version: 0.7.5
Developed by: Surreal Distractions 
Platform played: PC / Windows
Buy game on Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/340340

Weird Indie is a Let's Play gameplay series about games that got off the bus at the wrong stop.

Randomise User is the YouTube channel for videogaming in the raw - unpolished alpha games, weird game jam builds, bizarre 1980s retro and whatever other nonsense comes our way: https://www.youtube.com/randomiseuser
